name: A Forgotten Pulse
description:
You are a rat, exploring a ruined world.

You stumble across an enormous, mysterious figure.

From within can be heard a steady beating.

What could it be?

Controls:

←  → : Move

↑    : Hold to climb

Z    : Wall Jump

X    : Activate objects around you

Created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 51.

David Van Hise - Programming, Tileset Art 

Jack Scherban - Music, Sound Effects 

Thomas Ward - Music, Sound Effects 

Ben Knobloch - Spritework 

Ben Kobrak - Tileset Art, Additional Art 

Oscar Diaz - Additional Art
